IF you want to play online and it wont work try this workaround for the global servers 

http://www.moddb.com/games/freelancer/downloads/freelancer-global-server-workaround

The Microsoft global server went off line some time ago. If you need to get connected then here is how to do it in a few different ways.

1. Use an installer that will do it all for you. Freelancer List Server Patch

2.Use a mod that works with Freelancer Mod manager. Freelancer List Server Patch as flmod file

3. Do it manualy

You just need to modify your freelancer.ini in your EXE folder.

You?ll find the following line:
hostname = fllistserver.zone.msn.com ; GUN server in Redmond (DNS entry)

Replace that line with the following lines:
;hostname = fllistserver.zone.msn.com ; GUN server in Redmond (DNS entry)
hostname = gun.fllistserver.com ; http://www.fllistserver.com

I just thought I should inform the fans of freelancer that even tho the global server is offline, there are still a few servers out there that's fully playable.

one of them is Freelancer Universe, barely modded and the mod is optional (but it might be a bit unstable without it) and it's fairly easy to join, simply open "fldirectip.hta" in the \freelancer\exe\ folder and enter:
IP: 98.223.122.33
Port: 2302


If you're running VISTA i recommend you visit www.Freelancer-Universe.com and go to "Technical issues", there's a topic there explaning how to fix all problems with VISTA.

Be aware of the program you use to mount this disk image. I grabbed one for free and mounted freelancer and found out the program had altered my DVD drivers. My DVD no longer recognized CD or DVD discs... So check to make certain the software you use won't fuck up your drivers.

Be careful when choosing the App to mount this disk image. I grabbed one for free and mounted freelancer, the app altered my DVD drivers. My DVD drive no longer recognized CD or DVD discs... Check to make certain the software you use won't fuck up your drivers.

Be careful when choosing the App to mount this disk image. I grabbed one for free and mounted freelancer, the app altered my DVD drivers. My DVD drive no longer recognized CD or DVD discs... Check to make certain the software you use won't fuck up your drivers.
Be sure the app you choose to mount the disc image does not screw up your DVD/CD drivers. I grabbed an app for free and mounted Freelancer. Suddenly my optical drive would not recognize media in it.

for those having 'common.dll not found' or no-cd not working: there are TWO 'freelancer.exe' files, in the main directory of the game and in EXE subfolder, you should change them both with cracked version.
For those having flickering text all over main menu: google 'freelancer fonts problem', it's missing font in your computer

The game is version 1.0 and you can go to gamecopyworld to get the crack.  Extract the zipped file to the game directory in the EXE folder.  Overwrite file and you done.  Now you can play without mounting or inserting disc.  Great game, thanks alot jester45.

get the crack at gamecopyworld.  the game is version 1.0    place zipped file in the game installation folder.  Example  C:Program filesMicrosoft Gamesfreelancer  in the exe folder.  overwrite file and now you can play the game without mounting or inserting the disc.
